content: Our product candidates are manufactured at two fully operational sites, one  for Europe, and since very shortly l'll explain more, you've seen the news a few weeks ago that we sold our Princeton facility, the second is now through a supply agreement with Catlin's at our former manufacturing facility in Princeton, New Jersey for supply to the U.S. North America should say. And I want to take the occasion to thank our team for great efforts and contributions to ERYTECH and they made this site a real landmark site and that's also what would Catalent so and, obviously, we wish them all the best for their new future at -- in their new contacts and clearly we'll remain in close contact as they will continue to produce our GRASPA product for our ongoing trials, and hopefully also for the commercial supply in the not too far away future.
